approved_recommendations.insight: The 'habit_list' format is the clear winner: 6 posts averaging 3,424 views and 6.09% engagement rate vs account average of 1,498 views and 3.23%. This single format (19% of posts) is driving disproportionate results. The top post using this format hit 15,300 views with 332 saves - 10x the account average.

Posts with only hashtags as hooks (no actual hook text) are failing dramatically: 3 bottom performers averaged 298 views vs 1,498 account average. Post 7601563939775859999 had only hashtags and got 172 views. Post 7601999705182194975 with 'Screen time doesn't have to be a fight' hook still only got 448 views, suggesting the pillar itself may be oversaturated.

DIY/activity content drives saves (DIY cardboard: 26 saves, fine motor: 41 saves, outdoor activities: 332 saves) while achieving 9.58%, 8.99%, and 6.58% engagement respectively. These save-heavy posts average 3,732 views vs 1,498 overall. In contrast, 'picky eater strategies' got only 1 save despite 1,011 views, indicating low perceived value.

Only 12 of 31 posts have identified formats, and 5-slide posts (11 posts, 2,242 avg views, 42.5 avg saves) outperform 3-slide posts (1 post, 1,942 views, 13 saves). However, we have zero data on 6-7 slide formats, video-only, or carousel variations. The 'before_after' format shows promise (1,942 views, 1.54% engagement) but only has 1 post - insufficient data.

Content pillar distribution is too fragmented: 12 pillars with only 1 post each makes pattern detection impossible. The one pillar tested at scale doesn't exist. Meanwhile, 'outdoor activities' (15,300 views, 6.58% engagement) and 'DIY activities' (929 views, 9.58% engagement) suggest a 'hands-on activities' super-pillar could work. Current approach lacks focus and repeatability.

rationale: Eliminate lazy hooks and pause underperforming pillars with <500 avg views

tier_3_explore: transition prep for daycare and new siblings

content_angle: Focus on actionable activities over advice/strategies - activities average 73 saves vs advice averaging 5.5 saves

experiment_queue.hypothesis: More slides = more saves for list format
Validate before_after format with proper sample size
New format for parenting advice angle
Test video vs carousel for top format

sensory_and_outdoor_activities.rationale: Merge high-performing activity pillars - averaging 4,606 views and 104.75 saves

situational_parenting.rationale: Specific scenarios perform better than generic advice
